N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.14 - Retroactive time credits

State Regulations

Except for the provisions of sections
21.2
(i) and
21.3
of this Part granting vacation
and sick leave credits for the nine months' service preceding the date on which
an employee becomes subject to this Chapter, nothing herein contained shall be
construed to provide for the granting of retroactive vacation, sick leave or
other time credits to any per diem or hourly paid employee for service rendered
prior to August 14, 1958. [FN1]
[FN1] Section derived from concluding paragraph of

Resolution No. 86 of the Civil Service Department, approved by Governor July
30, 1958, amending Attendance Rules. Notes
